front.title: Comments on the new Telnet specifications

abstract.t: I would like to make the following comments on the proposed new TELNET Protocol Specification (NIC # 15372) and TELNET Option Specification (NIC 15373). In general I feel the new TELNET protocol is far superior to the previous version. There are, however, a few items of substance which I feel should be changed, as well as some recommended editorial changes.
